org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data

Class LCNItemMap

  • java.lang.Object
    • java.util.AbstractMap<K,V>
      • java.util.HashMap<org.openhab.core.types.Command,LCNItemBinding>
        • org.openhab.binding.lcn.logic.data.LCNItemMap
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Cloneable, java.util.Map<org.openhab.core.types.Command,LCNItemBinding>, org.openhab.core.binding.BindingConfig

    public class LCNItemMap
extends java.util.HashMap<org.openhab.core.types.Command,LCNItemBinding>
implements org.openhab.core.binding.BindingConfig
    This class maps ItemBindings on openHAB commands. It also keeps track about possible uninitialized items within the map.
    Since:
    1.7.0
    Author:
    Patrik Pastuschek
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

    • Method Detail

      • put

        public LCNItemBinding put(org.openhab.core.types.Command key,
                 LCNItemBinding value)
        Maps an ItemBinding on a key. Also the uninitialized flag is being set, because new items need to be initialized.
        Specified by:
        put in interface java.util.Map<org.openhab.core.types.Command,LCNItemBinding>
        Overrides:
        put in class java.util.HashMap<org.openhab.core.types.Command,LCNItemBinding>
        Parameters:
        key - An openHAB command.
        value - The ItemBinding to map.

      • hasUninitialized

        public boolean hasUninitialized()
        Returns if there are any uninitialized ItemBindings within this map.
        Returns:
        true if there are uninitialized ItemBindings.

      • setInitialized

        public void setInitialized(LCNItemBinding elem)
        Sets the initialized state of a single ItemBinding within this map.
        Parameters:
        elem - True if item was initialized, false otherwise.

      • remove

        public void remove(java.lang.String itemName)
        Removes all bindings for given item name.
        Parameters:
        itemName - The name of the item.
